allowed_modifiers.pill: Use `.pill` or `.overlay-pill` chips for context labels above the heading.
allowed_modifiers.grid: Swap `.bg-content` for a `.grid-container` when the hero needs multiple columns.
allowed_modifiers.list: Add instruction or key point lists within the overlay stack.
allowed_modifiers.card: Fallback to `.card.transparent` when the overlay should inherit neutral card styling.

required_fields.name: headline
required_fields.description: Single h1/h2 anchored in the middle of the stage.

required_fields.name: supporting_text
required_fields.description: Paragraph or prompt beneath the headline.

allowed_modifiers.pill: Prepend `.pill` labels before the centered headline.

required_fields.name: headline
required_fields.description: Section heading for the card stack.

allowed_modifiers.grid: Introduce `.grid-container`, `.split-grid`, or related helpers to lay out multiple cards.
allowed_modifiers.list: Embed `.instruction-list` or similar stack lists inside the card.
allowed_modifiers.table: Drop in `.discussion-table`/`.table-responsive` blocks for structured data.
allowed_modifiers.roleplay: Swap inner layout for `.roleplay-grid`/`.role-card-grid` to manage character briefs.
allowed_modifiers.scenario: Replace the main card body with `.scenario-card` story setups.
allowed_modifiers.worksheet: Pair with `.worksheet-grid` inputs for fill-in tasks.
allowed_modifiers.feedback: Reserve `.feedback-msg` regions for facilitator notes or just-in-time cues.

required_fields.name: pill_label
required_fields.description: Context chip displayed at the top of the slide.

required_fields.name: body_copy
required_fields.description: Freeform paragraphs, often without surrounding card chrome.

allowed_modifiers.table: Combine with `.discussion-table` or `.table-responsive` for quick reference grids.
allowed_modifiers.scenario: Attach a `.prompt-card` or `.scenario-card` after the pill headline.

required_fields.name: card_body
required_fields.description: Stack of paragraphs, instructions, or editable zones.

allowed_modifiers.grid: Combine with `.split-grid`/`.grid-container` to distribute editable cards.
allowed_modifiers.feedback: Expose `.feedback-msg` hints below the main card stack.

required_fields.name: grid_slots
required_fields.description: Editable or note cards arranged with `.split-grid`, `.note-card`, or `.gallery-grid`.

required_fields.name: content_blocks
required_fields.description: Legacy `.content-wrapper` structure containing header, body, and footer regions.

required_fields.name: action_bar
required_fields.description: `.activity-actions` buttons to reset or check work.

required_fields.name: token_bank
required_fields.description: Draggable or selectable tokens used inside quiz prompts.

required_fields.name: feedback_region
required_fields.description: `.feedback-msg` area that surfaces automated or teacher feedback.

required_fields.name: dialogue_box
required_fields.description: Single `.dialogue-box` containing the prompt or script.
